title: TOO PEOPLE WHO DONT GET SINGED
body: People IM TIRED of being reported for trolling and griefing when I'm just playing singed, the way he has been played since season 1. when I go for my LVL 1 PROXYS and die to the tower. its because people are boosted and want the lvl 1 kills so I execute. or if I do die. 1. MY LANER MISSES 1 WHOEL WAVE. 2 YOUR LANER MISSES A WHOLE WAVE. YOUR LVL 2 IM LVL 2 THEY LVL 1 WITH NO CS. THATS WORTH. WHEN I GO FOR A DOUBLE OR TRIPLE PROXY. AND THERE WHOLE team RECALLS. TO KILL ME. I'm going to ghost and ult and take as much cs as possible. that means you have TOP MID AND BOT AND JUNGLE ALL BUFFS ON THE MAP AND BARON to take objecives in exchange for mine. if I'm going 0 5 and I have 230 FARM BY 24 MIN AND YOU SAY IM FEEDING your a retard. you should be balls fed cuz your shitter lane oppenents are chasing me. so please learn how to play with this playstyle cause you people are annoying and have no game knowledge. I digress

replies.body:
Cool. All it takes is one good CC champ to shut you down and turn you into a literal feeder. Every time I'm playing Karma, if I notice a singed trying this shit I go kill him a few times till he stops being a retard. Then what happens when you have stacked mejais AP mages running around the map two shotting your team because you wanted to proxy?

Proxying is fine. Dying while Proxying is not fine against an opponent who knows how to leverage that gold you handed over for free.

Stopping a good Singed player can be tricky.  They will generally either see you early enough to execute themselves (denying you the kill-gold and wasting your time) or they will stall their death long enough that you could have easily gotten more gold from farming than killing them.

It's a good thing I still get all the gold my Zz'rot is farming for me, which comes out very fast when you kill a fail proxy farming singed a couple times. He's nowhere near fast or tanky enough to survive that early against a good opponent. Too many things have been added that really hurt proxy singed.  Of course if the enemy didn't bother with any of them, that's a different story.

That doesn't really help until the mid-game though (even if you rush it).  

Until that point, Singed pretty much has free reign to proxy farm if they are careful about it (which they should be anyways).  After you have it, he is generally durable enough to escape most gank attempts and dangerous to chase.

Depends on champions. At no stage of the game can Singed actually escape from Karma on equal gold for example. Several other champions can lock him down just fine too, you just don't see them that much because singed himself isn't popular either. If he starts coming back you'll see what I mean.
Singed can outrun both Karma's speed buff and her tether with Ghost and Ult, can't he? And if those aren't enough, it's definitely enough with Rylai's/Zz'rot passive/etc.

Nope. They are usually very close in base move speed because they build similar items. Singed will be slightly faster while both ghosting AND ulting, but not enough to pull away and break the tether. He would need flash for that. 

They are both running up well over the softcap for move speed which is why she can generally always keep up with him. 

She also has much more uptime on her speed and CC than he does.
I don't know how I outran Karma and broke out of her tether range then, when she was running to chase me. We both had T2 boots.

karma cant chase singed. because singed has a reliable easy to use slow that fucks karmas attempts to chase him. 

moral of the story. dont chase singed. no champion can chase singed and come out with a net positive gain
{{champion:240}}
lol kled into singed is so free. I love it when I face this stubborn bastard. I just take ghost ignite and get 5 free kills and then go unkillable for the rest of the game

i . . . im not sure about the kled thingl he does have immense sticking power but as long as singed dodges his Q he loses alot of that sticking power . . . and lets be honest any singed worth his salt can dodge that skill shot. it is a pretty slow one

He means Kled's ultimate. Except you can probably just run so far away that his path won't be close enough to lock on.
Kled's Q is meaningless when he can easily snap the tether.
yeah it has a windup time before it hits full speed. wouldnt be the hardest thing to side step

Singed doesn't die with "one CC". More like 3 or 4. And dying while proxy'ing is not "handing over free gold", if you're still collecting more gold than the enemy gets and you're simultaneously opening opportunities for your other laners, due to farm lost, time wasted, map pressure, etc.

OP isn't exactly very diplomatic, but when you go to the bottom of it, he is right.

And then you realize outside of point-and-click, he can just outrun a skillshot.
Even with point-and-click, with health that goes from 2000+ to 4000+ over the course of the game, he probably won't die, not to even mention his resistances.

And with Rylai's, Zz'rot's, Righteous, his ult, and Ghost, most people won't ever catch him in the first place. And if he successfully wastes either a large amount of time and/or abilties from one or more players, he did his job.
do i build singed wrong? i get archangeels, rylais, roa, dead mans, zz'rot. i thought righteous was bad rn.

I'd personally forgo Arch + RoA for Righteous because it gives the health and mana while giving a more useful active. You're already tanky enough. You're sort of playing a more health-mana/damage version.

I generally go Rylai's/Zz'rot's (one and then the other, order depending on matchup) into Swifty's usually (Merc's against a lot of CC), and then I usually get Righteous and other tank items that help specifically (Deadman's for more MS + against AD, Visage for more healing and against AP, etc) and sometimes a Liandry's for fun.

But what you have isn't wrong, persay.
It still works just fine.
This. If a Singed dies and clears a few minion waves in the enemy base, gets a few of their ults, and maybe even separates their team while doing so, mission accomplished.

As a jungle main god damn do I love when I see level 1 singed proxy. Free kills galore because bad singed players seem to think as long as they're proxying they're somehow playing well. Even if they are in fact feeding. 

"BUT MY CS!!!!!" who gives a shit if you have 40 more CS than your lane opponent if you've fed 5 kills and 10 assists?

This is how you tell the difference between a good singed and a bad one. A good singed needs to know when it's safe to proxy and when it isn't. No vision of the enemy jungler? Not safe to proxy. Suiciding to steal a wave of your team mates CS by proxying their base? Not worth. Two people dead on your team because they got hard engaged on while they're playing a 4v5? Not "noob team"'s fault.

**It's not always a good time to proxy. Just because you are proxying doesn't mean you aren't feeding**
Level 1 proxy is so risky, due to added pressure of possibly giving up first blood. I've never seen it work out for the singed player..

lol because there bad. they have a ward. only reason to die lvl one is if they blow there sums to get you. most top laners take ignite into me and use that lvl 1. sometimes the top laner will flash ignite me when I'm about to execute. I teleport back into lane and resume my proxy by then I have 20 cs to their 0. I win. I always win.
Usually you proxy when your jungler is stronger. If the enemy jungler is an Amumu and you have a Kha'Zix, you can be confident if you have your jungler on hand to destroy the opposition.
agreed. let singed be singed
God bless Singed players

Are you sure you're not just getting reported as toxic?

Because you seem pretty toxic.
pun intended?
Mix mix swirl and mix
im not gonna lie, i just read this entire post in [this woman's](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p4ynZowsDtU) voice.

> [{quoted}](name=Cant report Yuno,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4tdO2cPV,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-27T14:41:19.560+0000)
>
>  1. MY LANER MISSES 1 WHOEL WAVE.

WOAH what the fuck is this? Youre talking about stealing farm from another lane aren't you? What does this mean lol
He's means the enemy laner

> 1. MY LANER MISSES 1 WHOEL WAVE. 2 YOUR LANER MISSES A WHOLE WAVE.

right after that he mentions another laner, who is he talking about there then? How many laners we talking here?
OP means that his direct opponent and another enemy laner (typically, Mid) both lose farm when they waste time chasing him. He's not talking about his allied laners losing farm.

I love playing with a Singed, especially when our team excels at sieging and teamfighting. 

One game (where everyone was solo), we happened to get an extremely good team composition for the Singed on our team:
{{champion:27}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:25}} 

Between our waveclear and CC, we could just poke them down extremely well (killing anyone hit by a single CC) and prevent any attempts the enemy made to engage.  Singed had basically free-reign inside their base since they couldn't stop our siege and they couldn't afford to send more than a single person to stop Singed.
That sounds so disgusting to play against lmao

Oh, it was hilarious.

Having a dedicated splitpusher when the rest of your team excels at seiging and teamfighting can make it so easy to win games.  

If the enemy team positions or rotates incorrectly, they are screwed.

Honestly, as a fellow Singed player, I hate proxy-farming. Giving kills to the enemy top and jungle when they camp you is still feeding the enemy team gold, and the gold you are personally earning doesn't change that. Plus it's dull as shit, why would you want to do that instead of running circles around your lane opponent spamming laugh and watching them choke to death?

Sorry, but proxy Singed is not healthy to the game at all.

First off, you're taking CS away from other laners, this means experience, and gold that the enemy now has more of, over your teammate.
Secondly, almost every proxy Singed that I know ends up giving a few kills to the enemy cause they aren't good enough to execute themselves or get away in time, even the best Singed players and mains in Diamonds give up kills which furthermore places the enemy ahead.

Don't forget it's solo que and Singed isn't that popular, and no one thinks of pushing turrets or taking objectives while you distract their team.

Also, with all that gold, Singed is still weak, and literally does no damage more often than not, and his CC potential isn't even that good to make up for the fact of him having all that wasted gold that could have been more useful to the mid laner and ADC if he was triple proxy.

Also, how is Singed fun? You just run around, and farm. Nothing fun about that. The idea of fun is someone like Ekko, Yasuo, Kled, Zac, and many more with outplay potential, but maybe I'm just being too nick picky at this point, but to me, Singed isn't fun to play at all, it's almost as worse as Nasus.

So if I see a proxy Singed on my team, after the game, there is going to be a complaint filed more than likely against him from me, especially if he's intentionally feeding and assisting the enemy team by trying to triple proxy cause that's what he's doing. He's empowering the other team over his team, denying them of CS, letting the enemy team get ahead in CS, experience and gold.

I do not have a problem with lane Singed, but even then, it just isn't a fun pick, and not useful. Sorry to break it to you.

Hope ya have a good day tho :)

> Also, with all that gold, Singed is still weak, and literally does no damage more often than not, and his CC potential isn't even that good to make up for the fact of him having all that wasted gold that could have been more useful to the mid laner and ADC if he was triple proxy.

Wait a second...

> and literally does no damage more often than not, and his CC potential isn't even that good to make up for the fact of him having all that wasted gold that could have been more useful to the mid laner and ADC if he was triple proxy.

I see something in there...

> and literally does no damage more often than not, and his CC potential isn't even that good to make up for the fact of him having all that wasted gold

Zoom in a little...

> **and literally does no damage more often than not**

WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

I would have lost my shit at "no cc". How is a permanent slow on top of an 80% aoe slow + a displacement cc not Cc to you? I mean sure, its less than Maokai or Janna but cmon, thats a bit of a stretch. Rylais is absolutely core on Singed for that reason. ROA is a stat cannon but got dropped by builds due to the absolutely insane value of Rylais

anyone thats good at the game wont let you level 1 proxy, against a singed you always walk your first minion wave out of the base so if singed tries to proxy at level 1 you just beat the sht out of him. also proxy singed is really bad in low elo and assuming by your stats your awareness is pretty bad since you seem to die a lot.
Any Singed that has balls and is also good can proxy all he wants at Level 1
i mean maybe you have never played against someone who walks their first minion wave to lane but theres no way you will proxy at level 1 against that.

lol. beat the shit out of me. and it depends on the match up. every top laner except Quinn teemo cant really stop me when I lvl 1 proxy. and I die a lot early because the jungler and top use their sums to kill me so worth. and any singed player would just ghost for the wave. lol we don't give a fuk. id probably just die for the lvl 1 proxy depending on the lane match up tp back in and resume. YOU GUYS GOTTA UNDERSTAND WE DONT GIVE A FUCK. WE DONT PLAY BY YOUR RULES. anyways "you seem to die a lot" dosent really matter when I'm ahead in farm by 100 cs from 10 min mark. kills mean nothing in this game. objectives and farm. simple. I want you to lose farm and chase me and think that you can shut me down. because idgaf. you cant stop me form proxying

i mean we can try this out if you want buddy, dying for the level 1 wave doesnt actually do anything for you as it doesnt even make the enemy miss any farm and you cant proxy the wave as you would actually have to die for the wave which is retarded. 

you might actually get ahead by 100 cs by 10 min mark playing in silver ... if the enemy is even more braindead than most silvers but this isnt going to be the case in higher elo.
also walking with your minion wave does nothing. lol ill help you walk your minion wave XD

*to

EDIT: Another issue, "I digress" is the term used when you have gone off on a tangent that is not relevant to your main point. It is not a valid way to end an argument when the point made was the sole purpose of the post.

amen. i love a good singed on my team allows me to completely dumbster the enemy jungler with the preassure he puts on toplane. and since everyone below diamond is boosted trash nowadays ( no offence cause ima boosted trash aswell compared to the actual good diamond 1+ players) ppl will ALWAYS chase around singed for that free 100 g they get while they lose thousands of golds around the map.

I'm sorry, you're right on Singed mechanics, but you're wrong on team dynamics.

When you're playing "strange" champs like Singed, it's to be expected that even your own team-mates don't understand your champ. I mean, you're betting on the enemy team not understanding your champ, and your own team is from the same level, assuming match-making works correctly, so it's normal they don't understand either. So yeah, team-mates will call you feeder, they will blame you, and that will *always* be the case. You have to learn to play around it, on top of learning your champ proper. Calling them retarded and screaming won't help you win the game.

I just say I'm not feeding take towers focus on farming. and when they do they understand. one game. the jungler mid and top where camping me and I went like 2 8 within the first 20 minute but by the enbd of the game my jungler got all 5 drags elder and 2 barons because of my pressure. I made this thread to help people understand. basically leave us alone and let us do us. like even if I do feed. my oppents impact in the game is so little. because I wont let him leave lane. if they group as 5 to push their lead. I just proxy their base till they recall. they cant push towers. so I can always get better at this champ. but for silver I have my shit down to the T
